title: New: Agerskow & Funk Ethics – Obsession
body:
When it comes to Newcastle, this spoken from a Geordie, what the city might lack in an abundance of musical talent, it makes up for with its close knit community that leads to unexpected and frankly wonderful collaborations like this.

**[Agerskow](https://www.facebook.com/agerskow)**, a delicate and soulful folk singer, **[Funk Ethics](https://www.facebook.com/pages/Funk-Ethics/142752902415887?fref=ts)**, an ambient beat maker that at one point was suckling at the breast of both **Mary Anne Hobbs** and **Annie Mac**. However this is anything but a derailment for the two artists, their first track together, **_Obsession_**, is a sonically graceful lullaby turned perverse lust for a controlling obsession. **Agerskow**’s vocals are pitch-perfect, yet are aimed so freely they land in the most sporadically beautiful of ways. Just close enough to being apathetic to hint at something unhinged and psychotic. Promising.
